Administrator Subclassing / Dual Class Drandum:
When your subclass as a result of a long training reaches a certain level, you will have access special skills of the main class. Let's see if you've been training hard. To obtain a certificate need to be able to double the certified class or subclass above level 65. In the case of dual class, you need to be above level 85. Want to certify skills? Or want to get certified and learn skills with a certificate?
